statements: SELECT * FROM water_usage_data WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT usage_amount, facility_id, usage_date FROM water_usage_data WHERE facility_id = 2 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT facility_id, SUM(usage_amount) AS total_usage FROM water_usage_data GROUP BY facility_id;
SELECT AVG(usage_amount) AS average_usage, MAX(usage_amount) AS max_usage FROM water_usage_data;
SELECT facility_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM water_usage_data GROUP BY facility_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_data WHERE facility_id = 1 ORDER BY usage_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT facility_id, SUM(usage_amount) AS total_usage FROM water_usage_data GROUP BY facility_id HAVING total_usage > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT facility_id, COUNT(DISTINCT usage_date) AS unique_dates FROM water_usage_data WHERE usage_amount > 500 GROUP BY facility_id;
SELECT facility_id, AVG(usage_amount) AS average_usage, YEAR(usage_date) AS year FROM water_usage_data GROUP BY facility_id, year ORDER BY year, average_usage DESC;
SELECT facility_id, water_meter_id, usage_date, usage_amount FROM water_usage_data WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY facility_id ASC, usage_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_data;
SELECT facility_id, water_usage FROM water_usage_data WHERE facility_id = 1;
SELECT facility_id, water_usage FROM water_usage_data ORDER BY water_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM facilities WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facilities ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM water_usage_data WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY facility_id ASC
SELECT facility_name, SUM(water_usage) AS total_water_usage FROM water_usage_data INNER JOIN facilities ON water_usage_data.facility_id = facilities.facility_id GROUP BY facility_name
SELECT facilities.facility_name, water_usage FROM water_usage_data JOIN facilities ON water_usage_data.facility_id = facilities.facility_id WHERE facilities.location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM water_usage_data WHERE facility_id IN (SELECT facility_id FROM facilities WHERE location='California')
SELECT facility_name, water_usage FROM facilities JOIN water_usage_data ON facilities.facility_id = water_usage_data.facility_id ORDER BY water_usage DESC
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Buildings ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Facilities WHERE facility_type = 'Residential' ORDER BY facility_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(consumption) AS avg_consumption FROM WaterConsumption;
SELECT building_id, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM WaterConsumption GROUP BY building_id;
SELECT building_name, address FROM Buildings;
SELECT facility_name, facility_type FROM Facilities WHERE facility_type = 'School';
SELECT building_name, address, consumption FROM Buildings JOIN WaterConsumption ON Buildings.building_id = WaterConsumption.building_id;
SELECT * FROM WaterConsumption ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT building_name, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM Buildings JOIN WaterConsumption ON Buildings.building_id = WaterConsumption.building_id GROUP BY building_name;
SELECT * FROM facility;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name FROM facility WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM water_meter ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT facility_name, building_type FROM facility JOIN building ON facility.facility_id = building.facility_id;
SELECT building_name, COUNT(*) AS total_meters FROM building JOIN water_meter ON building.facility_id = water_meter.facility_id GROUP BY building_name;
SELECT * FROM facility;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM facility ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM water_meter WHERE reading > 1000 ORDER BY reading DESC;

SELECT facility.facility_name, meter_location FROM facility JOIN water_meter ON facility.facility_id = water_meter.facility_id WHERE facility.facility_name LIKE 'A%' AND meter_location LIKE '%Floor%';

SELECT building_name, building_type, COUNT(*) AS meter_count FROM building JOIN water_meter ON building.facility_id = water_meter.facility_id GROUP BY building_name, building_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM green_building_facility;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM green_building_facility ORDER BY facility_name DESC;

SELECT u.usage_date, w.total_water_used FROM water_usage_data u JOIN water_meter m ON u.facility_id = m.facility_id JOIN green_building_facility f ON f.id = m.facility_id WHERE f.facility_name = 'Example Facility';
SELECT reading_date, water_used FROM monthly_water_usage WHERE meter_id = 1 ORDER BY reading_date ASC;
SELECT billing_date, total_amount FROM billing_info WHERE facility_id = 3 AND total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM green_building_facility;
SELECT facility_name, location FROM green_building_facility ORDER BY facility_name DESC;

SELECT facility_name, usage_date, total_water_used FROM green_building_facility JOIN water_usage_data ON green_building_facility.id = water_usage_data.facility_id WHERE total_water_used > 100 ORDER BY total_water_used ASC;

SELECT facility_name, reading_date, water_used FROM green_building_facility JOIN water_meter ON green_building_facility.id = water_meter.facility_id JOIN monthly_water_usage ON water_meter.meter_id = monthly_water_usage.meter_id ORDER BY facility_name, reading_date DESC;

SELECT facility_name, billing_date, total_amount FROM green_building_facility JOIN billing_info ON green_building_facility.id = billing_info.facility_id WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
